EmailTemplate.name: Detailed Invoice has changed

Hello {!LVGO__Contract__c.LVGO__CSM__c} ,
Detailed Invoice? has been updated by {!LVGO__Contract__c.LastModifiedBy} at {!LVGO__Contract__c.LastModifiedDate}.
If you feel these changes are incorrect please contact the Salesforce user who made the change. This is an automated message, please do not reply.
